Blog.post: Did you know that tofu doesn't taste like anything at all? It's like a solid mass of water. No taste, fleeting texture. Fat-free tofu mayonnaise is so-o-o muh worse than tofu, however. It tastes like tofu (nothing), after being slathered in Eau de Hot Ass. The upside is, by including fat-free tofu mayonnaise as part of a weight-loss diet regimen, your chances of success are improved, especially when one considers the fact that one's desire to eat anything to cleanse the palate of hot ass vanishes quickly.

Single Professional Female, early 20s, willing to trade night of unbelievable, toe-curling, [hopefully not] sweat-inducing passion for perfectly serviceable air conditioning unit. Offer of night of passion can only be redeemed after AC is installed, of course. Owner not responsible for friction burns. No guarantee of sweating is implied.

It's on days like this one that I fear Spontaneous Human Combustion the most. Like someone's gonna break into my apartment and find nothing but a pile of dark ashes, sooty fingernails, and a can of Diet Pepsi™ on the chair in front of my compter. And perhaps a cat turd, because my cat has a tendancy to dig, squat, and bury in anything remotely resembling a pile of sand.
I am so lacking in motivation right now that I can barely even finish typing this sente
AC, AC, my kingdom for AC! I swear, I just saw a bee burst into flames right outside my window. It's that hot.

Raise your hand if you know just how depressing it is to wake up alone. Again. For the fifth month in a row. If you are on a fulfilling diet of regular sex, fuck you. No, wait. You suck. No, wait... I hate you. Yeah, that's it. That makes a lot more sense.

I am so fucking sick of dating (or, rather, "casually having sex and maybe drinks and rarely dinner with", because apparently, "dating" connotes too much fucking commitment) pathetic, posturing, pustulent man-boys with severe cases of Recto-Cranial Inversion™. Sad thing is, the good ones aren't all taken. No, they were killed off in the tragic Worthy Heterosexual Man Massacre that happened just before I came of age. If you've got a better explanation of what happened to all the decent straight men in this country, I'd like to know it.
Man! Self-important windbags on the internet have abused the shit out of the haiku format, haven't they?

Y'know, it'd be nice if life were to give me a hearty handshake, a pat on the back, and a token of congratulations for having gotten through it thus far, and having the courage to keep on doing so. Ain't gonna happen, though.

For once, I'd like to just be happy. Not tentatively happy, knowing in the back of my mind that a bad time will soon effectively eclipse the good. Not cautiously optimistic. Not "not bad". Not "okay". Happy. Like, fuckin' delirious man. Untouchable. Invincible. Unstoppable. Amazing. Without drugs, of course. Just so you know. And I don't want any of my life comforts to change, either. Like, I don't want one (or more) of those shitty things to happen that eventually become something cool, and in retrospect you guess you're happy about it, but while it happens you almost feel like killing yourself. Not that. I just want to feel good. To smile because I want to, not because some tactless assclown tells me I "look so much prettier when I smile". I want, for once, to not fear what the future holds. And to not dwell on the hatreds of my past. And I don't want some jackass spouting post-modern philosphies at me like I give a shit.
I'm so scared of what my future holds. I should be anticipating, not freaked out of my fucking mind.

It's one of the biggest family days of the year, and I'm all alone. I'm many miles away from my closest family, and all my friends are off doing happy things with theirs. As accustomed as I am to being by myself, it really sucks to be alone on a day like this. I want to watch the fireworks, but I don't want to go to a family-oriented affair and be the only person who's there alone. Like I don't stand out enough already. National holidays are really depressing for people like me. I felt this way on Memorial Day, and I'm sure I will feel this way on Labor Day. *sigh*
If I were reasonably rich, more than half my current problems would be solved. But I wonder if I would just be trading them in for new problems?

I've become a gym rat. I'm hooked on the strain and sore muscles; the sweating and the grunting; the stretching and the farting. At least, that's what I try to convince myself of since I made a pact to go there 7 days a week. Lucky me. I firmly believe that my yoga instructor was an assitant to Dr. Mengele in the Third Reich. She's a natural-born torturer. She doesn't seem to understand that certain body types can't be bent into pretzel shapes, no matter how hard the owner of said body type tries. I've been scared lately. Of my life crumbling before my eyes because of the non-implementation of a simple procedure, the success of which I've been waiting for over a year. I feel so helpless when my quality of life rests in someone else's hands. The worst part is that try as I might to kick-start the process, all I ever get is empty promises and hollow apologies. I wish he'd just cut the crap and do it already. I'm sick of waiting, and with each passing day, my motivation slowly slips away. I wish I was thin and beautiful, instead of fat and humorous. Fat, funny girls don't get laid nearly as often enough. We also don't get fucked with as much as skinny girls, but you understand what my focus is here.

wench just posted this on PS: "...few people ever have the golden opportunity that we have provided you here: the chance to see yourself as others see you. Too often, people are unwilling to offer constructive criticism to one who asks for an objective opinion. It's unpleasant to tell another the bad things we see in their personalities. " She's so right. I should add that it's also unpleasant to hear other people think that you just plain fucking suck.

What's my blog about? Me. My life. The "sometimes soap drama / void of good excitement" that defines my existence in general. I can't promise that it'll always be interesting. I can, however, promise that it'll always be real. Wish me luck
I can't believe I'm doing this.

I can't understand why it is that even as my professional life is finally settling down, my personal life remains on the skids. I am more financially independent than my peers, and I've got a good head on my shoulders. I've been told many times that I've got a beautiful face, and though I'm overweight, I'm very athletic, and I have artistic leanings and a bit of an exotic flair. I'm kind and patient, and I've got a good sense of humor. So why am I still painfully single? And why did I dump the first guy that showed genuine interest in me for a long time because I didn't think he cared anymore, and would have rather been single than sleeping with a guy who only called me when he needed a favor or wanted to sleep over? Did I blow my last chance of love? Does wanting to be loved mean you have to settle for something that's not good enough just because it's something, and something is better than nothing? I hate being the only single in a group of Smug Couples. And I hate hearing about other people's relationship problems. Shutthefuckup, okay? At least you have someone to complain about.
I just saw the Mark Wahlberg and Jennifer Aniston movie "Rock Star". What a piece of shit.
Don't kid yourself.
You know there aren't enough hours in the day when you have to shit and brush your teeth at the same time.

Can a cat survive on a diet supplemented by catnip-mousie fur? Just wondering. I'm guessing she uses it for fiber, because all 12 of the mice are now hairless plastic versions of their former selves, and I can't find a scrap of fake fur anywhere. Oh well. As long as it keeps her regular. And in completely unrelated news, I wish I could cryogenically preserve my uterus in a containment facility outside of my body until I decide to use it. This once-a-month pain/runs/swelling/cramps shit ain't funny.

I'm lonely. My lonliness is palpable. My friend is hurting, and I feel that I can't help her feel better. My cat is ill, and I feel that I can't help her feel better. I usually see myself as a strong person, but faced with two situations in which I can do nothing but be idle and patient while the issues resolve themselves, I feel helpless and dejected. And I'm not sure what to do about that. An agreement that I made is not working out for either party, and I am frustrated and angry about how it will end, and the impact it will have on my recently-adopted lifestyle change. And I'm not sure what to do about that, either. I'm lost. Which way is up? And do I walk or swim in that direction?

OtherAIMid (12:16:17 PM): i LOVE you!* (*based on my comment on a message board that reads as such: ----"Oh, cry me a fucking river..." Hey, Concerned Parents of America: if you don't want your kids watching this stuff, don't let them. There's no abuse laws that cover turning off the TV, changing the channel, or sending the kids to bed early. I'll say the same thing that George Carlin said to the woman with the Baby on Board sign in her car: "I'm supposed to curb my habits because some lady forgot to put her diaphragm in?" People, society should not and will not bend around your decision to procreate." ----) Conjecture (12:17:01 PM): Thanks! It had to be said. When did corporations and childless people like myself get roped into providing the limits for America's kids?

I lack motivation, because dealing with my work supervisor has left me drained of all interest in doing a good job. I am sick of the heat. Is it fall yet? I want to wear clothes with sleeves on them. I can't breathe out of both nostrils at the same time, and I'm too poor to see the doctor. Also? I'm tired of complaining about the suckiness of my life at times. Gimme some good, no, make that fucking great news to report. And please don't follow it up with something bad to overshadow it like you have a tendency to do.

I hate it when my life spins out of control...and there's no particular area of my life that I can fall back on to regain control. On the other hand, I did feed the pond ducks today, and that took me away for a few.
I am so unhappy. That is all.

I hate my manager. She is the single reason that a job I once loved is now the bane of my existence. And she's succeeded in driving a wedge between my boss and myself. She's also responsible for my only working 20 hours a week now instead of 40, leaving me to find another part-time gig in the worst job market in years. So wherever you are, KM, congratulations. I hope karma bites you in your ass when you least expect it. Fuck you.
I cannot wait for Autumn to get here, putting an end to the fashion of midriff-baring shirts, low-rise jeans, and navel piercings. I am s-o-o fucking sick of seeing that shit...

Maggots are the most disgusting creatures ever to exist. Cleaning up a maggot infestation is the most disgusting task a person can ever do. Why can't the cat puke into the toilet or sink, instead of under the bed where I won't spot it until it starts to smell like a decaying corpse a week later? Blah. And why wasn't she born with opposable thumbs so that she could clean up after herself? Have you ever tried giving a pill to a reluctant cat with projectile-shedding fur, sharp claws, and fangs to rival Dracula's? Not fun.
My kitty's getting better! Yay! She was so-o-o sick...

"The foregoing constitutes an opinion that I held, or purported to hold, at the time I typed it. It does not necessarily constitute an opinion that I currently subscribe to, or that I may subscribe to in the future. For that matter, my daliance with it at the time I typed it may have been nothing more than philosophical experimentation-- a sort of drunken tumbling-into-bed with an opinion of the same sex, or maybe an opinion with an ugly tattoo of a blurry unicorn on her hip who kept yelling "Woo Hoo" every time AC/DC came on the jukebox but who had a pretty nice looking face and who came on really strong so what was I really going to do plus I had had about 19 beers by then and was pretty much going to go home and masturbate and fall asleep in front of misleading informercials about allegedly beautiful women who somehow are so lonely and desperate that they want me to call them at 3:00 a.m. for the low price of only 99 cents a minute-- I mean, really, the broads in those commercials bear about as much resemblance to the trailer-park mommies that staff those lines in real life as the foregoing statement of opinion bears to my actual beliefs, at least as far as I'd be willing to share them with a total stranger like you,which is not at all, so don't get any ideas, ok? Ok." Heh heh. Thanks to writdenied.

A letter I have not yet sent to my Mom, because I don't want to burden her with my own worries: I'm losing hope, Mom. The odds are stacking higher and higher against me, and all I have in me is fear. Fear that I'll fail; fear that my best efforts will blow up in my face; fear that all of what I've fought for and tolerated and sacrificed so much for will be in vain. My strength is failing me. I can't turn back now, but it seems as if I can't step forward, either. I don't know if I'm going about it all wrong, but no one can give me any answers. My finances are in disarray because of my work situation. Even though I have friends who are rallying on my side, they do not and cannot understand what it is I have to go through, and what I have been through. No one knows what I have sacrificed and put up with, and in this endeavour, I feel very much alone. I was hoping that a step (that I haven't made yet) would make the situation easier, and allow me to sidestep what I have been doing thus far, but the risks are far greater, and I have to build, between myself and this other person, a mountain of lies in order to make this work. But the risks are far greater now. And I don't know yet if he's willing or able to take it on with me. I don't know what to do. I'm losing faith in my own ability to make the outcome beneficial to me, and that has been the only thing driving me. My motivation is flagging, and my patience is wearing thin... Mum, I don't know what to do. Do I take the risk, with the odds being what they are? If I do, then a chance remains. But at what cost? I guess I'm just weakening; it's an uphill battle, but if I return, there is nothing left for me. I will have to start all over again, and I will never forgive myself for having failed myself. I really don't have an option at this stage but to keep on keeping on, but both paths forward are littered with their own pitfalls, each more perilous than the rest. And here I stand, at the crossroads of my future, needing to believe in myself but seemingly unable to do so. The burden is getting heavier each day, and I see no respite. I need the strength of two people right now, and I just don't have it in me. I wish things were perfect. I wish so many times that my adult life would have been easier, and that the choices I have made would have netted me greater joy, but right now, I despair. I'm not giving up, by any means, but that doesn't make this burden any less difficult to carry. It's such a hard road I've traveled, and it doesn't look as if it will get much easier anytime soon. I'm trying to keep my wits about me, and I am as careful as I can be, but I live in fear of it all coming crashing down around me. I refuse to accept that it will, however; I will try my best. I will plummet into the deep unknown and pray fervently for a successful outcome. But I need your encouragement, and when my own strength fails me, I will need yours.
I think I'm Man-Poison™. I'm Raid™ for penises.

My boss just yelled at me over the phone, screaming obscenities and threatening to fire me. It was all I could do to keep my shit together. Then, he came back on the phone, explained to me the stress he was under, and all but apologized for ripping my head off. I've allowed myself to be taken advantage of by my employers, in anticipation of a better reward coming soon, and I'd just about reached my wit's end with the screw-overs and empty promises that are immediately forgotten by those who matter most. I don't know if I can hold to this wavering hope much longer. My humanity's at stake, and so is my adult life... More on that later. The second I got off the phone, I burst into tears. Now, all I want to do is curl up into a ball and cry for the rest of the day. If crap took a crap, that would be how I feel. Happy fucking Holidays to me. Give me one good reason not to end the pain right now.

I can't figure this guy out. He's good to me, but has a predilection for shoplifting. He respects and adores me, but tries to fuck (or has fucked) everything in a skirt. He's looking for a girlfriend, but can't seem to make any progress with any of these women before there is a major falling out. He's funny, but sometimes he irks the shit out of me. He's attractive, but I'm no longer attracted to him, now that I've gotten to know him better. I have major trust issues, so I am hesitant to write off yet another potential friend, but I'm trying very hard to figure out whether or not I'm making excuses for the guy to get over my own issues. I've been one to foolishly compromise my standards for a few men, and I never want to do that again. I fear I may be overcompensating now in my attempt to not be taken advantage of. Or I might be overcompensating now because I've been so quick to dismiss people based on several things in a similar vein in the past. I don't know which it is, or if it is both. Fuckin'-A, man. Something nags to me that he's bad news, if one were to look objectively at half the things he's done, and half the things he says, but an equally strong nag tells me I should stop expecting someone, anyone, to be perfect (that is, fitting into my own pre-defined idea of what constitutes a "good person" and thus a "good friend"), and I should just lighten the fuck up and give him a chance. And then another. And then another. You get the idea. I'm torn. I want to open a gate in the walls I've built, but I also want to keep my guard up. I can't do both. And I hate the fact that I can't make up my fucking mind about him.

Don't ever agree to be friends (especially good friends) with anyone who you're sexually attracted to, if you have realized that the relationship will never go further than that. Because when that person feels comfortable enough around you to flirt with someone else right in front of you...you WILL feel like shit.
I am so unhappy. And I blame myself for not trying hard enough.
Wah. Blah. Sniff. That pretty much sums up my day/week/month. It's a wonder I'm still here.

I am not alert, animated, aware, bouncy, bright, brisk, bubbly, buoyant, cheerful, cheery, gay, jaunty, lively, spirited, sprightly, sunny, vivacious, airy, animated, blithe, bouncy, bright, bucked, buoyant, caffeinated, cheery, chipper, chirpy, contented, effervescent, enlivening, enthusiastic, glad, gladsome, hearty, high, hilarious, hopeful, jocund, jolly, joyful, light-hearted, merry, optimistic, peppy, perky, pleasant, roseate, rosy, snappy, sparkling, up, upbeat, winsome, zappy, zingy, or zippy. So don't expect me to be all Little Miss Mary Fucking Sunshine. I got yer good mood right here, pal.
"People who live in glass houses should have sex in the basement." - Thanks, jo-ham! (www.randomwibbles.com)

Last night, I developed a sickening crush on Robbie Williams, after seeing him on "MTV Cribs". The boy is SMOKIN' HOT!!! Hoo-boy! I lurves me some adorable Brit bad-boy with a snarl and a shit-eating grin, yes I do. I even had a dream about him last night. Creepy, no? Don't tell the mister.

"It drives me apeshit when I don't feel other people are valuing my time. I won't tolerate people being late to meetings, I won't sit in a meeting that isn't productive (yes, I will just get up and leave) and I don't mess with the time of others. At the same time, I will and can be very patient if I feel that something is worth waiting for - I guess I just have a clearly developed sense of that worth." Well said, mulberry (3WA).
Forgive me for saying "Fuck you". My name is "Might Have Been". My name is "Never Was". My name's "Forgotten". Courtney speaks the truth, man.

We eloped today. The ring feels weird on my finger. I have gone from an "I" to a "We" in one fell swoop. I'm scared shitless; I don't know the first thing about being married. I'm thinking getting married while you're unemployed is not necessarily the brightest idea. But, it was what we wanted to do. Wish us luck!
I am the perfect example of what happens when the Odds beat You.
I am a misanthropic grouch. I expect a proxemic bubble six feet in diameter from strangers, and library silence after 11PM from my asshole-ish, loud-ass-motherfucker of a neighbour. Is that so wrong?

The Dante's Inferno Test has banished you to the Second Level of Hell! Is it so bad that I have a fascination with carnivorous plants? They're just so FUCKING cool, man!

My heart hurts so much. I feel like a broken person. If anybody loves me, I need to hear it right now. But I know that I won't. And that makes me just want to cry and rock myself to sleep, since no one else can do it for me. I am so friggin' alone.
Never, EVER, under any circumstances, use an electric toothbrush as an experimental vibrator. Owie. Walking today's gonna be tricky. Very tricky.
Am I the only one who, when Beck was at the height of his popularity, listened carefully to his lyrics and subsequently thought he was nuttier than squirrel shit? I am? Never mind, then.

When I read the many and varied online journals of people living in NYC during The Great Blackout of 2003 who bitched and moaned about the harrowing ordeal of that simple inconvenience, my first reaction was to silently mouth, "shut the fuck up, you whiny crybaby." Things have changed since then. Now, I yell instead. "Shut the fuck up! You whiny crybaby!" Try living through a hurricane in the third world. Try going without a shower for 2 weeks. Try catching rainwater and boiling it before consumption because the groundwater is polluted by the remains of animals and people who drowned in the rivers and dams. Try going for a month without electricty, doing homework by candlelight, cooking on an outdoor coal stove that you have to squat on the ground to use because there's no gas, and having to cough up a bribe to get the electric company servicemen to turn your power back on after every other street in the neighborhood had light except for yours. Try being unable to get a message of your safety to relatives in other parts of the world concerned for your well-being for 3 weeks because the phone lines had fallen to the ground. Try any of those things, and let me see you bitch about one fucking day without electricity ever the fuck again.

Things I am thankful for: Opposable thumbs Internet (including File sharing, Blogs, BBSs, High-speed access, and IM) Digital cable TV with all the movie channels Ben and Jerry's Cherry Garcia ice cream Chiraz, Corona, and Patron Silver tequila (and bartender friends!) Smoked turkey legs at ren faires Cold doggy and kitty noses Duckies swimming and quacking away at the pond My very vocal walking hairball of a cat whom I love very much Air conditioning My oomfy bed Macs and optical mice Cat loaf! (hee!) Scented candles Pacific sunsets and wetlands My awesome family (at least, on my mother's side) Lime popsicles Near east wild rice and longrain rice mix (rice, in general, is good stuff) Sushi (especially all you can eat) Good buds and killer buzzes Warm water showers
My feet are swollen. Is it possible to have edema when you're not knocked up? See, I didn't know that either.
Also? Kudos to the person who first introduced me to the word "foomfed". As in, "...her body wedged into the shoebox, the cat's long fur foomfed out all around her". Hee! Foomfed!
Wheee! Cat loaf! Heee!
You know you're busy when you don't have time to masturbate, and can't remember the last time you did.
Dear Doge Motor Car Company, There isn't a single pizza delivery guy in North America who drives a spankin' new BMW to deliver his pies. Not one. Sincerely, Con Jecture.

Scietists find world's oldest set of genitals. http://www.newscientist.com/news/news.jsp?id=ns99994175 Somehow, I don't think it sacreligious or insensitive to throw Strom Thurmond's name out there. Which would be funny, except for the whole him being dead thing. Eh. It's Monday.

Re-reading my most recent posts, I realize that my emotions have been all over the place lately. But nobody notices it, because nobody reads this (my blog, a.k.a. my emotional purging grounds) but me. I wonder if that roller-coaster movement of my feelings (trying to steer clear of cliches here) is a bad sign. I hope not. Of course, just by including the the word "hope", I have doomed myself. Bah. Can I get a do-over of the last 7 years? If I could have, I would have done a lot of things differently. "If I knew then what I know now", and all that... Hindsight, 20/20, etc. Cliche, cliche, cliche. I'm done.

I thought of people who have left my bathroom stinky. Tiny apartment + stinky bathroom = unhappy ConJecture. Then I remembered that this never came up when my aunt and Mom were visiting. Unstinky relatives made me crack a smile. *Sighs* I miss my family. *cries a little* A guy from LA Fitness just called, asking for my best friend. He had signed up temporarily, to use the gym while he was here for a week visiting me. I laughed a little. I miss my friends. *cries a little more* Sometimes, on top of feeling like a fraud, I feel like I all but cling to my meager existence, and I do it all by myself. I feel like my choices have betrayed me, and I have let myself down before I even started. And then my cheeks flush, my eyes water, my spine tingles, and my heart hurts ever so slightly more than it does every day now. I never knew what crying on the inside felt like until now.

I was reading an unconventional online journal today. A self-confessed geek professed his feelings for a (very sweet, apparently) girl with whom he spends a lot of time. She makes him smile. She makes him lunch. They do uncomplicated activities together... I feel so sad now. *Gloom*

I found a cat toy in my gym bag. At the gym. (A fellow patron looked at me holding it aloft, puzzled, and remarked, "left the bag open, did ya?". I smiled back at her.) It's amazing how much a simple, random, and infinitely amusing discovery such as this can lighten up one's day. Hee!

I swear, if one more thin-skinned bitch in customer service expects me to know the jumping-thru-hoops procedure she has to endure on her side, and thinks that I must submit my request with a heavy dose of sympathy, I am going to reach through thru phone and strangle her. How in the eff am I supposed to know what you just went through to get me that quote? You can explain, and I can most certainly sympathize, but I'm not gonna know that beforehand, you imbecilic twat. Stop feeling so fucking victimized. Honey, I'm a total stranger. I don't know you, and I don't give a squirrel's left nut that you're having a bad day. Especially not since you've been so incredibly huffy and rude to me. I pay you for a service, and if you don't want to provide it, find another line of work, okay? Needless to say, she totally fouled up my mood. At the end of the freakin' day, too. Sniveling bitch. Grrrr....

"My mom's an elementary school secretary, and she's also mentioned an Orangejello. With a sibling named Lemonjello. (And there might be a third I can't remember.) posted by Utilitaritron at 9:41 PM PST on November 13" We've all heard this one. Yes, I'm sure that a close relative of yours has taught, treated, or babysat these two young boys. Yes, I'm sure you know it to be fact that two twin boys exist, whose mom had the nerve to bestow upon her sons such godawful names. Yes, I'm sure you relate this factual tale at parties, knee-deep in your fifth Miller High Life, and everyone encourages you by actually laughing at this stupid fucking anecdote. Guess what? IT'S BULLSHIT! You heard me. I've stumbled across this lame joke too many unforgivable times, and I assure you, it's fake. Every last person swore up and down that a relative of theirs knew these kids. That's impossible. Please, do me a favor, and let this joke die. It ceased to be funny five years ago. Enough already. It's bullshit, and all people do when they hear it is roll their eyes, out of nothing but sheer disbelief that you could be that. fucking. stupid. Let it go.

I swear, I have enough cat hair in my carpet, on my clothes, in dark recesses of the bathroom, on the kitchen floor, buried in the couch, in my hairbrush, festooned throughout my linens, and floating in the air at my apartment to knit a whole 'nother cat. I swear, once the hot weather comes back and she doesn't need it for the whole 'keeping her bony ass warm' thing, I'm gonna shave her. A nice, feline-military buzzcut. Especially around the aforementioned bony ass, where it seems to grow like tufts in an old man's ears. Heh. When I do that, I'll figure out a way to post pictures here.

THREE PEOPLE WHO MAKE ME LAUGH: --Eddie Izzard --Ricky -- urlLink M.Giant THREE THINGS THAT SCARE ME: --Failure --Spiders --Rejection THREE THINGS I LOVE: --Spanish guitar melodies --My family --My cat THREE THINGS I HATE: -- urlLink POTUS --Being fat --Never getting enough sleep during the week THREE THINGS I DON'T UNDERSTAND: --The popularity and proliferation of Assholes and Jackasses in Modern Society --The desire to engage in extreme (read: bone-shattering) sports --Intolerance THREE THINGS ON MY DESK: --A zillion or so hand-written reminder notes --CD organizer --20 oz. bottle of Diet Cola THREE THINGS I'M DOING RIGHT NOW: --Listening to Internet Radio --Ovulating --Aching from yesterday's workout THREE THINGS I WANT TO DO BEFORE I DIE: --Live the posh life --Travel the world --Leave my mark THREE THINGS I CAN DO: --Organize almost anything --Make things look better --Vector-graphic animation THREE WAYS TO DESCRIBE MY PERSONALITY: --Intelligent --Driven --Strong THREE THINGS I CAN'T DO: --Ride a Bicycle --Surf --Compromise myself just for a relationship THREE THINGS I THINK YOU SHOULD LISTEN TO: --My voice --Internet Radio --"Teardrop" by Massive Attack THREE THINGS I DON'T THINK YOU SHOULD EVER LISTEN TO: --Other people's bullshit --Self-Impressed politicians and public speakers --People who insist that their tatoo(s) didn't hurt THREE OF YOUR ABSOLUTE FAVORITE FOODS: --Sushi --Barbecue --Ethnic cuisine THREE THINGS YOU'D LIKE TO LEARN: --Surfing --Traditional dance: Swing, Tap, Jazz, Salsa, Merengue, Samba, Tango, Foxtrot, Waltz, etc. --How to love myself more THREE BEVERAGES YOU DRINK REGULARLY: --Diet Cola --Coffee --Spring Water THREE SHOWS YOU WATCH REGULARLY: -- urlLink Survivor -- urlLink Iron Chef -- urlLink Family Guy

Brian Molko of urlLink Placebo has a voice that makes me shudder. In a good way. You see, Brian's got this thing that's gone missing in most trendy music: talent. To put it simply, the boy can sing. His voice is easy on the ears. And him being easy on the eyes helps, of course. Stare into those baby blues and tell me you're not haunted. Go urlLink watch the new video for their single "Simple Needs". 'Til the end, damnit. You're welcome.

Transformer Refuses To Change Back Into Volkswagen CYBOTRON—Following an intense battle with Megatron and his evil Decepticons Monday, former robot-in-disguise Bumblebee refused to revert to his natural state as a yellow Volkswagen Beetle. "I hid my existence in this world by taking the form of a vehicle! I revealed my true nature when I was called upon to protect earth!" said Bumblebee, a member of Optimus Prime's heroic Autobots force. "I refuse to change back into a humiliating bubble-shaped compact car!" Bumblebee added that Megatron arrived on earth with one goal: Destruction! from: urlLink http://www.theonion.com/index.php?show_p=2 Can you see what's wrong with the above? I mean, as much as I love The Onion , no true 80s scholck cartoon fan can sit idly by while these fuckers rape the corpse of Autobot memory. It's CyBERtron, goddamnit! *deep breaths* Whew. I'm calm. I'm calm.

Sometimes I wonder out loud if one of the requirements for being a Customer Service Rep is that you have to be a giant flaming asshole beforehand. Like, you have to be an unrepentant shitpig to the point that you inspire homicidal thoughts in complete strangers. I gotta wonder sometimes.

So, the people urlLink here decry the iTunes Music Store because they claim the artists get such a small cut of the money the track costs the consumer. Why is Apple under attack? Why not the Music Industry, the ones who sue their own consumers and screw their own artists? I don't get it. Also, I don't buy it. Until I can watch "Cribs" and not see some talentless jagoff bragging about his solid-gold ceiling or his $350,000 worth of bling-bling, or flossin' his ridiculously over-customized SUV, I'm not readily going to accept that major-label artists are poor. Call me crazy.
My little sister just offered me free VIP tickets to the Britney Spears concert. I guess I should feel a little guilty aboutt how loudly I laughed in her face.

"Only lesbians drive Subarus". Not quite. I drive an Impreza, and I've never dined at the Y. I do notice an inordinate number of lesbians friends I've had who drive Subaru Legacy/Outback wagons, Toyota Rav 4s, and VW Passats. I wonder what that's all about. I guess people will attribute any trends to a commone thread, no matter how slight.

I've picked up a new obsession: urlLink food blogs . It's fascinating, really. I live vicariously through those that have the financial wherewithal to be choosy about what they will and will not eat, especially on a day-to-day basis. I'm poor, so fancy eating's not something I can do more than once a year. And by fancy, I mean, 'a step above chain resturant, with tablecloths and reasonable service'. Not 'snooty waiter with a hand towel and a convenient french accent' fancy. The only time I've ever paid at a $30+ per entree place was by mistake. All other times (not that many, admittedly), I've filled up good eats and good wine on somebody else's tab. One caveat: any food blog I visit has to have pictures of said food, or I'm outta there mighty quick. That way, I can drool at the pics and just imagine what they'd taste like, if indeed I could afford to live that richly.

So, I'm selling this 2-year-old 19" TV I have for $60. $60! That's really cheap for a color TV in perfect condition. This guy e-mails me about it: "Hello! I"m interested in your 19-inch TV for sale. What brand is this and how old is it?" I respond: "It’s a black Sansui 19”, and it’s less than 2 years old. It was manufactured in 2002. I’m selling it really cheap, even though it’s in excellent condition." He writes back: "Hmmm. It's not exactly the brand I was looking for. Would you sell it for $40?" Unreal. Are you fucking kidding me, ya cheap bastard?!? $60 for a 2 year old TV is inexpensive as fuck already! Do you negotiate with the people you pay for sex, too? What a douchebag . He strikes me as the sort of person who would go into a dollar store and proclaim that he won't pay more than 50c apiece for the items in his shopping basket because they weren't brand name. Dick.

Oh, how I wish I could afford to eat sushi and shellfish every day. Imagine, a feast of toro, unagi, sake, ebi, saba, maguro, kani, hamachi, tekka maki, buri and a side of ice-cold oysters with horseradish, a sqeeze of lemon, and some cocktail sauce... heaven.

If you were in an office building with 200 other people, 70% of whom are men, 96% of whom don't wash their hands after they use the bathroom, wouldn't it sicken you to imagine all the disgusting genital detritus that accumulates on all the frequently-touched surfaces, such as door handles, coffeepot, copy machine, etc.? I'm not a germophobe, but shit, is it too much to ask that a group of adult males rinse the cock off their fingers after they finish touching themselves in the bathroom? I'm gonna start wearing a pair of surgical fucking gloves from now on.

This culture of excess that exists in America in the throes of an economic crisis sickens me. Whatever happened to "living within your means"? Just because some 2-bit celebrity hack who won't be famous 5 years from now can afford to drop $180,000 on a tricked-out Escalade with chrome and custom everything doesn't mean you have to keep up with the Joneses. I have so many friends who don't give a shit about financial security, as they're far too focused on what they've got now. $30,000 in credit card debt doesn't matter to a 26-y-old who's eager to acquire a phat new set of 24s for his spankin' new Avalanche. People now care more about how they're perceived by others more than ever. The late 90s seem to have ushered in a new era high-maintenance imagery to compete with the status quo. Don't get me wrong, if you've got it, spend it, but do you really need a car with your initials stiched into the headrests and 5 seperate DVD players? Do you really need the $250 Replay jeans when Levi's are fine? Do you really need to eat at Nobu if you can only afford Benihana? I get distressed when people who make less money than me floss like crazy. I feel shitty because I'm up to my ears in educational debt as well as debt incurred when I was fresh out of college and had to take out cash advances on my credit cards to pay rent, buy groceries, and fix my car so I could go on job interviews, and I'll be paying through the nose for a long damn time. I have nothing to show for my success except a stack of bills. No bling, no floss. No tricked-out anything. And I'm fine with that. Financial responsibilities are a fact of my life that I cannot ignore, no matter hwo much I wish they weren't there. Some people don't seem to have that perspective. How can one rationalize racking up $30,000 in credit card debt when one makes $27,000 a year? And I end up paying for their excess in unemployment taxes and higher debt premiums. It is so motherfucking unfair. I've had to opt out of a 401k plan because my budget is tight enough already. I can't imagine living any way but frugal on the 60% of my income that I'm allowed to keep before they tax everything I spend it on. I'm bitter. I admit it. I don't want some phat wheels and an expensive wardrobe, though. I want to not have to pay numerous late fees and 26% APR. I want to not have to declare bankruptcy to avoid my creditors. I want a life where what I work hard for is what I get. If I want to splurge, I am justified in earning it, not feeling as if I'm somehow entitled even if I never lifted a finger. But this world is never fair. And I will continue to struggle mightily to make ends meet while my broke-ass neighbors cruise the streets in their phat rides which beg to be stolen.

My life sucks. I've had silent moments to reflect upon the changes I've been through; the rough hands I've been dealt; the bullshit I've had to swallow, and the sacrifices I've had to make. After I mentally conclude that I've come too far to give up, I'm overtaken by doubt. What am I fighting for? Can I win? Can my dreams actually come true? I know that I have a lot to be thankful for, and I am. It's just that... well, I'm human. As strong as I am, I have my moments of despair, when hope is snatched out of my reach, and I've but a thread to cling to. It's tough being so far removed from my support system. Recently, I've had a much harder time believing in myself and my ability to live through this and come out on top. My life is a mess. It is slowly unraveling. Where will I go? What will my options be if I fail? I'm lost, and I'm scared. I'm thisclose to losing all hope. If that happens, what is to become of me? I do not know.

Jeebus. A whole urlLink segment on Michaelangelo's David's restoration (click on video), and not one glimpse of the famous wang. They even went as far as to blur out the ass-crack in one shot. Can the media get the fuck over it's Nipplegate-induced, FCC-mandated hypersensitivity to sex already?

To the urlLink Christian Exodus : Bye. Don't let the door, etc. Adios. Please build a big wall with razor-wire on top, guard dogs and land mines, and ban cross-border movement. Thanks. You'd be doing decent human beings a favor if you fundy nutjobs kept to yourselves. Pray for plague.
Now I'm not so sure. I want to, but this whole thing is kinda creeping me out. But I really want to. But I'm not sure.

Friday night was a first. Saturday night? Was a little exciting, but a little odd. Right now, I'm trying to figure out if I'd like to parlay Saturday night into tonight. I'm not even sure how. Logistically, it makes very little sense. But that may be me overthinking as usual. I want to, I really do, but I'm not sure. But will I ever be sure? I don't know. Will it be an opportunity I'll regret passing on? Again, I don't know. But I really, really want to. I just cringe at the thought of the possible rejection.

To the guy I spoke with on the phone last night, I share with you the words of my buddy MotorLed: "I'm a liberal and there's not a goddamn thing you can do about it, you stupid cunt. And these swear words I'm using? I don't give a fuck if your children can hear them. Your children are assholes."
As hard-assed a bitch I can be, this urlLink article had me welling up.

When I moved into my current place, I had to pay a pet fee of several hundred dollars. Domino's a spayed adult female cat with no front claws, and she weighs less than 9lbs. How on earth is her potential for damage greater than that of a kicking, screaming, food-flinging, pissing, shitting, badly-behaved toddler? I think certain people with young children in their apartments should, if not relegated to their own buildings with other ill-suited parents, be forced to pay a child penalty, which supplements everyone else's rent, simply because the neighbors are the ones who have to put up with all the fucking noise. Tantrums, cartoons, videogames, running... jeebus, this is the sort of shit we have to put up with for keeping our legs closed?

Judging from what my friends doing the online dating thing say, I think it's rather odd that guys who resort to the internet to find new girlfriends can be so damn choosy. More often than not, my friends get dropped because their pictures weren't appealing to the guy. People, my girlfriends are not at all ugly. I guess the open-buffet style of dating makes people not feel bad about sampling the tiniest bit before throwing the whole thing away.
Y'know, I really wish those women who can orgasm "30 to 40 times! OMFG! LOL!" in the course of one round of sex would stop fucking bragging already.
Y'know what I want for my 26th birthday? A 40GB iPod and a cake shaped like a penis.
Yeah, you. stop reading. I told you already this was private. Keep dropping in and I'll pull this whole damn thing, I shit you not.

Why is it that I get messages like these: > you are such a hottie > u r very pretty > hi sexy > u have a very pretty face > very nice pics that u sent me > i can't believe such a sexy and beautiful woman is actually chatting with me > You're cute! > it only shows your pretty face and this: > you're very easy on the eyes, gorgeous yet I'm still painfully single? I see ugly girls in relationships all the time! What am i doing wrong? Do I have to make less of an effort in order to attract a decent guy? Fuck, I just realized how shallow that makes me seem...

Why is it the guy I have the most in common with is someone who's exceptionally off limits, recently moved out of town (just as we were getting to know each other), and will never regard me as anything but a friend? I need to stop longing for men I can't have.

My friend chewed me out for calling her at 9:56 one night. Like, not even 10 yet, right? Apparently, in their household, they go to bed early. Well, sweetheart, before you and him moved in together -- you know, in the heady glory days before you systematically alienated all your friends by being so unavailable, so distracted, and and so wrapped up in your relationship... the days before you started the near-constant complaining about how few close friends you have now compared to before... remember those? Yeah, me neither-- you never went to bed before midnight, so screw you too.

There are all these blogs about men not being able to get any sex from their SOs, and they complain bitterly about it. Completely understandable. What I don't get is why women withhold sex. I, personally, love to fuck. If I were a guy, I'd be hard all day. If I were to write down the thoughts that go through my head on a daily basis, I'd have priests sprinkling holy water on me and demanding that the lustful demons that inhabit my body be cast out. And even as a 20-something female who loves to fuck, I have difficulty both finding and getting partners. How is it that the libidinously gifted don't often meet each other? If I had a boyfriend, we'd be having all sorts of crazy monkey sex, the sort of sex where you wake up the next morning and realize there was indeed a wet spot, and, oh, by the way, your panties are hanging from the ceiling fan, all the time. I'd be so enthusiastic that he'd beg me to let him rest for a few days. And on the rare day that I'm not up for a full-on romp between the sheets (on the ground, up against the fridge, in the shower, sitting at my desk, whatever), nothing gets me (or him) off quite like a Damn Good Blowjob. I love (love!) giving those. My technique makes men weak in the knees, and I'm damn proud of it. Back to my original point: why do womena withhold sex, and why do men allow them to? If I were married, and my husband refused to give it up, you'd best be damn sure than I'd have a wandering eye. I wouldn't be able to stay with him very long after he started withholding, either. I'd divorce his ass and go get me some of the good stuff from whomever I damn well please so quickly, it'd make his head spin. Who wants to be with someone who is so unwilling to compromise on so vital an aspect of a functional relationship? I couldn't do it. And if I felt stuck in the marriage for whatever reason, valid or otheriwse, I'd cheat. Plain and simple. I wouldn't cheat to get revenge, I'd cheat because I like to fuck and I can't at home. Jeebus. All these posts about sex... I seriously need to get laid more often.
FYI: An effective way to worm your way into a stranger's bed does NOT involve the liberal use of the phrase "When the hell am I gonna hit that?".

She has a long-term boyfriend. The cute, muscular one who spends every weekend with her and her little brat, takes them out, babysits that snot-nosed terror of hers, cleans up, cooks, and even takes out the trash. The guy who made a good gesture of tolerating her ex when he blew in like an ill wind to perform his bi-weekly child custody dance. A pretty nice guy, it seems. She's cheating on him. And how! In the last 2 weeks, I've seen her with 3 different guys, all of whom went on to spend the night. There may have been more, but I only saw 3. The latest sighting was a couch-displayed, lights-on, mid-cunnilingus startle caused by me walking past her wide-open front door. Charming. I feel so bad for the guy, putting up with her shit (she screams obscenities at him all the time, and bitches about the things he doesn't do to please her) and nasty chain-smoking habit, and treating her like she's the most important person in the world, while she makes no attempt to hide her infidelity. It's like she wants him to catch her skanky ass.
Whoever first said money can't buy happiness must have been on some awesome drugs.

Is it too much to ask that the people in charge actually know what the fuck they're talking about? I mean, really. How can one make proper command decisions unless one knows what it's like in the trenches? How can a director figure that a whole e-commerce site built in 2 days by one person is a realistic expectation? How can you be the director of marketing and creative services if you've never done a lick of creative work in your life, and can barely even turn on your fucking computer? Suffice to say, I don't get it. Why are you in charge again?

So it (sort of) went as planned. There were several hitches, but he was good-natured about it. We laughed a lot. We talked relatively easily for a first-time meeting. The awkwardness was minimal, and pretty much gone by hour 2. And he was such a gentleman that he e-mailed me this morning to tell me he had a lovely time. And we've made tentative plans for next weekend. Wonderful, right? Except I don't think I'm very attracted to him. He's a bona fide geek. Make no mistake about it. And that initial spark just wasn't there. You know how they say a girl knows in the 1st 5 minutes whether or not she'll ever sleep with you? So true. And I didn't once feel that. If what I want is care and adoration, can I put the sex aside and be happy with just companionship, or will that constitute leading him on? And I don't know what words to use to reply to his e-mail. I want to stop overthinking everything, but I don't know if I put aside my analytical neuroses, that any eventual outcome will convince me that I held them for a reason. Fuck, why is life so fucking complicated?
Some days, I wish I could just set people on fire.
Well, so much for my date this weekend. The fucker didn't even have the nerve to cancel. He just fucking disappeared. Gotta love that sort of compassionate approach to letting people down, yeah?

A willingness on the part of a good girl to fuck you on the first date does not translate to her being a dirty whore. Get the fuck over yourself, yo. Besides, she didn't fuck herself. You were involved too, asshole. If she's a whore, what does that make you?

BN: I took a tumble on Friday night, resulting in a bruised left patella, various lacerations and bruising on my arms and legs, and the loss of a patch of skin the size of a quarter on my right foot. Plus, my right foot swelled up to twice its size. WN: After that injury, I woke up Saturday morning with strep throat. GN: I was able to get an appt. w/ my doc this AM, and thanks to insurance, got x-rays of my left knee and right ankle, 2 sets of medication, and an office visit for an awful lot less than I would have had to not-pay-because-I-can't-afford-it if I wasn't insured. BN: I needed a tetanus shot, and now, my arm hurts like a mofo. Plus, the cut on my foot had become infected. GN: Because of the contagious nature of strep, I have to stay in for a few days, doctor's orders. So, YAY, paid semi-vacation from work!

Last week at the urlLink aquarium , my companion was looking at the beautiful fish swimming freely and interacting with each other, the light dancing on their marvelous scales, the beauty and grace of their movements captivating all onlookers, and I? Was thinking, "Mmm.... sushi". Now, don't get me wrong, I love the aquarium more than anything; marine biology is a urlLink passion of mine, and it was my idea to go. But if I see urlLink yellowtail , salmon, and eel swimming in a tank, I want them urlLink on my plate . If it makes you feel any better, I didn't feel any hunger watching the jellyfish. Just pure, childlike amusement and glee.

It's shameful how many high school graduates can't spell, or even compose a proper sentence to save their lives. A sampling of e-mails I've received in the last 24 hours: "...a hanest and jenerous person..." and this gem: "...nope im not a hobiest im a profesanel diver..." Appalling. Simply appalling. These are my peers, people. These are the fuckers who get raises and promotions before I do because they were born with external genitalia. What the fuck is wrong right with the educational system?
